title: James Cleverly – 2023 Statement Warning Iran Not to Execute Alireza Akbari
author: admin
summary: The statement made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on 13 January 2023.
content:
The Iranian regime should be in no doubt. We are watching the case of Alireza Akbari closely. Iran must not follow through with their brutal threat of execution.
